name: Shpelz
description:
Welcome to Shpelz! (Early access of the beta of the demo of the game!)

Shpelz is (currently) an infinite dungeon generator, which produces boring, bland and samey rooms. As you play the game you'll encounter many bugs... I mean features. There will be changes in the future!

Controls: 

  • M to maximise and minimise the game when you play the downloaded version.
  • WASD to move The Wizard.
  • QE to rotate the camera around the Y axis. (The forward direction is the orientation of the camera.)
  • X  to rotate the camera around the X axis.
  • Z to zoom.
